Development and
product design solutions
for your Startup.

We develop your idea into a prototype for validation and real user tests or a MVP ready to go within two weeks, with our team of product and Agile experts.

The service first round starts bringing up the problems from your idea.
Next step
On the second day, we put up all the possible solutions.
Next step
Drawing the first wireframes it fills up the third day of the project.
Next step
Your team and ours design a mockup graphic interface for your product on the fourth day.
Next step
We test and validate our solutions with real users finishing the first round.
Next step
We develop a high-fidelity and interactive product based prototype.

service

Through design thinking and UX concepts, we find out problems e bring solutions to your idea, delivering a prototype for demonstration, validation and tests with real users, all that within two weeks.

Express MVP

We'll detail your needs, we plan the whole project and deliver a web or mobile app ready to use within one (web) or two working weeks (mobile), at a fixed investment.

First part of the day is dedicated to planning the week and getting to know your idea.
Next step
Second step, we draw screens on paper and decide together what's best for your product.
Next step
Following, we split the planning into tasks for the next days of your project.
Next step
End of the day one: we estimate tasks and you prioritize it's development order from most to less important.
Next step
We dedicate the next three days to development of the tasks in the prioritized order.
Next step
Last day is dedicated to tests and final delivery. There you go: you get an App ready to use!
